name: HENrietta
description:
A game jam game about a chicken named HENrietta that shoots a laser out its beak!

The game is a super simple roguelite third person shooter, where you infintely spawn new islands only to be greeted by evil piggies, which you have to blast to smithereens using your laser.

Once you kill the last enemy a key is dropped which can be picked up and used to open a new gate, which generates a new island.

Have fun!

Controls

WASD - movement

MOUSE - mouse look

LMB - Shoot

SPACE - jump

E - action key

Known shortcomings

- player's health isn't shown in any way

- amount of golden coins isn't saved between sessions

- character controller is buggy to say the least
